structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
INTERCITY, INTERCOUNTY AND CITY-COUNTY COMPACTS FOR PURCHASING AND MERIT SYSTEMS -- RETIREMENT AND DISABILITY PLANS FOR EMPLOYEES OF COUNTIES AND CITIES

law.catch_line: Intercity or intercounty compacts for purchasing and merit systems authorized.
law.text: Two (2) or more cities, or two (2) or more counties, or counties and cities together within the Commonwealth of Kentucky, in order to promote greater economy, may enter into an intercity or intercounty compact for the purposes of establishing a single purchasing unit and the merit system.
